statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT action, COUNT(*) AS count FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY action;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM transaction_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, timestamp, NOW()) AS months_since_action FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY months_since_action DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM compliance_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, description FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action, user_id, timestamp FROM compliance_logs WHERE action = 'approve' AND user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM transaction_logs JOIN compliance_logs ON transaction_logs.log_id = compliance_logs.log_id WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, user_id, transaction_type, timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614173000';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, role FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 'c02db123-6a43-4b8d-9e0e-68eff024e2b4';
SELECT log_id, transaction_type, timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.action FROM user_accounts u JOIN audit_trail a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT t.log_id, t.timestamp, a.details FROM transaction_logs t JOIN audit_trail a ON t.log_id = a.audit_id WHERE a.action = 'approved' ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT t.log_id, u.username, t.transaction_type, a.action FROM transaction_logs t JOIN user_accounts u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN audit_trail a ON t.log_id = a.audit_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'refund' AND u.role = 'customer' ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_log ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type FROM transaction_log WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, compliance_id FROM compliance_log WHERE compliance_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM transaction_log ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_time FROM transaction_log WHERE user_id = 3 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT log_id, compliance_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_log WHERE compliance_status = 'pending' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, action FROM transaction_log WHERE user_id = 5 AND action = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transaction_details WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT status_id, status FROM compliance_status WHERE log_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_profile WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT log_id, amount, currency FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT log_id, status FROM compliance_status WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
